alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Cherokee; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 9:51PM CST until December 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Sioux, Cherokee and Buena Vista Counties. In South Dakota, Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s and Tuesday morning`s commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle continues this evening. Freezing rain will develop after midnight. As temperatures warm Tuesday morning freezing rain will change to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
